backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor providing contact form submission, admin-restricted submission viewing, and user profile management with AccessControl enforcement.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing an implemented typing animation in the Home page hero span and its associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference file listing short summaries of all frontend components and pages in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining OKLCH color variables, theme layers, dark mode overrides, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining meta tags, favicons, SEO fields, and root mounting element for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes for main pages and wraps them in the shared SiteLayout component.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactF: React contact form with validation, inquiry topic selection, backend submission, and success/error handling.
frontend/src/components/home/HeroCarouse: Autoplaying, draggable hero image carousel with reduced-motion support and custom slide ordering.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer component showing branding, quick links, contact text, and a credits section with a heart icon.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Responsive site header with logo, desktop links, and mobile navigation via a sliding sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Page layout wrapper rendering header, footer, and routed content via Outlet.
frontend/src/components/motion/RevealOnS: Wrapper that reveals children with a scroll-triggered animation, respecting reduced-motion settings.
frontend/src/components/services/Service: Clickable service card displaying icon, title, description, and a call-to-action hover effect.
Dialog panel showing detailed service info, features, applications, and a contact CTA.
Search and category filter bar for services using input and select controls.
frontend/src/config/branding.ts: Centralized branding config defining logo assets, metadata, and company info.
frontend/src/content/services.ts: Data definitions and list of service objects containing descriptions, features, applications, and icons.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing the backend actor based on user identity and refreshing dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity authentication, login flow, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Hook for submitting contact forms through the backend actor with mutation handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useReducedMotion.ts: Hook detecting the user's reduced-motion preference via media query.
frontend/src/hooks/useSeo.ts: React hook that updates document title and various meta tags for SEO and social sharing based on provided title and description.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining light/dark theme variables, utilities, and component styles including grid patterns and slideshow elements.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that initializes React, sets up React Query, wraps the app in Internet Identity and renders it.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: About page that applies SEO metadata and renders company information, expertise list, and animated reveal sections.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact page that sets SEO metadata and displays contact details alongside a form with scroll-based animations.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page with SEO setup, animated rotating text, hero carousel, and service overview sections.
frontend/src/pages/SolutionsPage.tsx: Solutions page that sets SEO metadata, filters and displays services, and shows details for a selected service.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugin integrations.
